ModMetaData.name: [Ods] Third Reich - Uniforms (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Odstriman
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Odstrimans mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508927726
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/ThirdReichUniforms
--- Original Description --- Uniforms of the Third Reich.
--
Uniforms include:
Infantry with camo
Waffen SS with Camo
Officer varients
Fallschirmjagers
Winter varients
Military police
All textures were done by me and coding, its not the most optimized; coding could be better but this mod will be finalized on a later date.
Future plans:
Soviets
Empire of Japan
Commonwealth
Also special thanks to T4NDY for making a Russian language patch
